sarath fonseka mahatha ha ohuge bana ekwa sidukara athi awi ganudenu pilibandawa wiwada kirimata sajiwi sanwadayakata paminimata labana sikurada thek wipakshayata kal dena bawa jathika nidahas peramune sabhapathi parlimenthu manthri wimal wirawansha mahatha pawasayi.awi ganu denu pilibandawa pasugiya sathiye pawathwimata niyamithawa thibu sajiwi sanwadayata sahabhagi wu eksath jathitha pakshaya wiwidha hethu idiripath karamin wiwadaya manga hari athara ee osse sathya thorathuru dana ganimata janathawata athi ayithiiya uduragath bawath ohu sandahan kaleya.sajiwi sanwadaya sandaha wipakshayen dedeneku sahabhagi karawaganimata nohaki wuwa nowa, wiwadaya manga harimata ek upakramayak lesa eya upayogi kara gath bawa wirawansha mahatha sandahan keleya.kese wunada eda sanwadayedi wipakshaye his wu putuwa niyojanaya kala yuththe janatha wimukthi peramuna bawath awi ganu denu pilibanda sajiwi sanwadayata sahabhagi wimata labana sikurada thek wipakshayata kal dena bawath wirawansha mahatha sandahan keleya.ee mahatha me bawa sandahan kele kolambaa galadari hotalaye eeye (12) pawathi madhya sakachchawata ek wemini.mema awasthawata amathya rajitha senarathna mahatha athulu pirisak sahabhagi wuha.
